title: Devoted
description: The conclusion to the heart-stopping, gut-wrenching Lace Underground trilogy.She came. She conquered. She destroyed.How did I lose control so fast?I knew it was dark and twisted. Only, what I did in Lace Underground didn't feel wrong. I'm left dealing with something huge and dark and life changing and there is no one who understands. Everything is different now. The man left a big impression, and he had a terrible secret to hide.
author: Tess Oliver
